title.value: Stochastic Simulated Quantum Annealing for Fast Solution of Combinatorial Optimization Problems
title.justification: It is the title of the paper.
title.quote: S TOCHASTIC S IMULATED Q UANTUM A NNEALING FOR FAST S OLUTION OF C OMBINATORIAL O PTIMIZATION P ROBLEMS

extractions.description: In this paper, the authors introduce an efficient method named Stochastic Simulated Quantum Annealing (SSQA) to solve large-scale combinatorial optimization problems. The SSQA method is based on stochastic computing and quantum Monte Carlo approaches, which emulate quantum behavior using classical computers. The paper demonstrates the efficacy of SSQA in solving graph isomorphism problems with up to 2500 spins, showing significant improvements in convergence speed compared to traditional methods.

type.justification: The paper evaluates the proposed SSQA algorithm through simulations on graph isomorphism problems and compares its performance with traditional methods.
type.quote: The proposed method is evaluated in MATLAB on graph isomorphism problems, which are typical combinatorial optimization problems.

name.justification: The main focus of the paper is on solving combinatorial optimization problems using the proposed SSQA method.
name.quote: Combinatorial optimization is the process of searching for the optimal solution of an objective function in real-world applications, such as scheduling and machine learning.

name.justification: The paper introduces this model as a primary contribution.
name.quote: In this paper, we introduce stochastic simulated quantum annealing (SSQA) for fast solution of combinatorial optimization problems.

is_contributed.justification: The main contribution of the paper is the introduction and evaluation of the SSQA model.
is_contributed.quote: In this paper, we introduce stochastic simulated quantum annealing (SSQA) for fast solution of combinatorial optimization problems.

is_executed.justification: The SSQA model was executed in MATLAB as part of the evaluation process.
is_executed.quote: The proposed method is evaluated in MATLAB on graph isomorphism problems.

is_compared.justification: The performance of the SSQA model is compared with traditional Simulated Annealing (SA) and Stochastic Simulated Annealing (SSA).
is_compared.quote: section 4 compares the proposed algorithm with the traditional SA, SSA and QA methods.

referenced_paper_title.justification: The SSQA model presented in the paper does not cite an external paper for its definition.
referenced_paper_title.quote: In this paper, we introduce stochastic simulated quantum annealing (SSQA) for fast solution of combinatorial optimization problems.
